snippet: Owners and the union have drawn close to a deal that would end the lockout, but they remain far apart on when players can become free agents, among other contractual matters.
lead_paragraph: Owners and the union have drawn close to a deal that would end the lockout, but they remain far apart on when players can become free agents, among other contractual matters.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Contract Issues Are Final Hurdle in Talks
headline.main: Contract Issues Emerge as Final Hurdle in N.H.L. Talks
headline.print_headline: Contract Issues Emerge as Final Hurdle in N.H.L. Talks
